title: NYC Antisemitic Hate Crimes Rise
body: New York City Police Department data shows a sharp rise in antisemitic incidents, with Jews accounting for 62% of all hate crimes reported in October, totaling 47 incidents, 29 of which targeted Jews.

title: Preparations for Rochel Imeinu Yahrtzeit
body: Israel Police prepare for Rochel Imeinu's yahrtzeit at Kever Rochel, deploying hundreds of officers and troops to maintain order and direct traffic.

title: NYC Hate Crimes Rise Sharply
body: New York City police data shows a spike in antisemitic incidents, with 62% of reported hate crimes targeting Jews in October. 47 hate crimes were reported, 29 of which targeted Jews.
